alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 28 at 10:58PM EDT until October 29 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 1 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Fairfield County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 1 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor coastal flooding are likely with the morning high tide cycles through at least Tuesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 29/12 PM 9.7/10.2 1.9/ 2.3 0.6/ 1.1 1 MINOR 30/01 AM 9.1/ 9.6 1.3/ 1.8 1.0/ 1.5 1 NONE 30/01 PM 9.5/10.0 1.7/ 2.2 0.6/ 1.1 1-2 MINOR BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 8.7 FT, MODERATE 10.2 FT, MAJOR 11.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.4 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 29/12 PM 9.3/ 9.8 2.0/ 2.5 0.9/ 1.4 1 MINOR 30/01 AM 8.5/ 9.0 1.2/ 1.7 1.2/ 1.7 1 NONE 30/01 PM 9.1/ 9.6 1.8/ 2.2 0.9/ 1.4 1 MINOR 31/01 AM 7.8/ 8.3 0.5/ 1.0 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
